title: Gabber Consent
name: there
main-content: Now is the time to provide consent for your audio interview (Gabber) to be made available for others to enjoy by clicking the button below. There are options to: share the audio, a text only version, or not share at all.
sub-content: Thank you for capturing and sharing your experiences. We hope you will enjoy and appreciate the other conversations created by Gabber that are interesting to you.
